insert into shop_detail
id, name, address, longitude, latitude, phone, open_time, close_time, status, remark, shop_mode, add_user, add_time, update_time, brand_id, update_user, is_open, city, photo, wait_red_envelope, base_money, high_money, shop_detail_index, restaurant_id, ali_seller_id, ali_appId, ali_private_key, ali_public_key, appid, appsecret, mchid, mchkey, pay_cert_path, wx_server_id, is_meal_fee, meal_fee_name, meal_fee_price, slogan, queue_notice, is_new_qrcode, is_user_identity, consume_number, is_sub, rolling_switch, sweep_mode, open_union_pay, open_money_pay, pos_plus_type, open_shanhui_pay, dazhong_shop_id, dazhong_app_auth_token, integral_pay, pos_open_table, open_pos_ali_pay, open_pos_union_pay, open_pos_money_pay, open_pos_shanhui_pay, open_pos_integral_pay, open_pos_charge, day_sms_type, tv_mode, modify_order_print_receipt, modify_order_print_kitchen, open_pos_pay_order, open_order_remark, tv_apk_version, is_pos_new, page_size, open_pos_wechat_pay, template_type, wait_ip, tv_text_color, tv_background, tv_textbox_background, tv_head_text_color, tv_number_color, wait_jiaohao, wait_jiucan, wait_guohao, wait_remind_switch, wait_remind_number, wait_remind_text, is_recommend_category, open_meituan, mq_id, is_turntable, turntable_print_type, open_bad_appraise_print_order, bad_appraise_print_receipt, bad_appraise_print_kitchen, article_photo, is_takeout, open_pos_discount, apart, consumption_rebate, rebate_time,
open_bad_warning, warning_key, warning_wechat, warning_sms, shop_tag,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openTime,jdbcType=TIME}, #{closeTime,jdbcType=TIME}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopMode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{brandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isOpen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{waitRedEnvelope}, #{baseMoney}, #{highMoney}, #{shopDetailIndex}, #{restaurantId}, #{aliSellerId}, #{aliAppId}, #{aliPrivateKey}, #{aliPublicKey}, #{appid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appsecret,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mchid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mchkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payCertPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wxServerId}, #{isMealFee}, #{mealFeeName}, #{mealFeePrice}, #{slogan}, #{queueNotice}, #{isNewQrcode}, #{is_user_identity}, #{consume_number}, #{isSub}, #{rollingSwitch}, #{sweepMode}, #{openUnionPay}, #{openMoneyPay}, #{posPlusType}, #{openShanhuiPay}, #{dazhongShopId}, #{dazhongAppAuthToken}, #{integralPay}, #{posOpenTable}, #{openPosAliPay}, #{openPosUnionPay}, #{openPosMoneyPay}, #{openPosShanhuiPay}, #{openPosIntegralPay}, #{openPosCharge}, #{daySmsType}, #{tvMode}, #{modifyOrderPrintReceipt}, #{modifyOrderPrintKitchen}, #{openPosPayOrder}, #{openOrderRemark}, #{tvApkVersion}, #{isPosNew}, #{pageSize}, #{openPosWeChatPay}, #{templateType}, #{waitIp}, #{tvTextColor}, #{tvBackground}, #{tvTextBoxBackground}, #{tvHeadTextColor}, #{tvNumberColor}, #{waitJiaohao}, #{waitJiucan}, #{waitGuohao}, #{waitRemindSwitch}, #{waitRemindNumber}, #{waitRemindText}, #{isRecommendCategory}, #{openMeituan}, #{mqId}, #{isTurntable}, #{turntablePrintType}, #{openBadAppraisePrintOrder}, #{badAppraisePrintReceipt}, #{badAppraisePrintKitchen}, #{articlePhoto}, #{isTakeout}, #{openPosDiscount}, #{apart}, #{consumptionRebate}, #{rebateTime},
#{openBadWarning}, #{warningKey}, #{warningWechat}, #{warningSms}, #{shopTag},
mapper.update: update shop_detail set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},is_open=#{isOpen} address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, open_time = #{openTime,jdbcType=TIME}, close_time = #{closeTime,jdbcType=TIME}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shop_mode = #{shopMode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, add_user = #{addUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wait_red_envelope = #{waitRedEnvelope}, base_money = #{baseMoney}, high_money = #{highMoney}, shop_detail_index = #{shopDetailIndex}, geekpos_queue_islogin = #{geekposQueueIslogin}, geekpos_queue_last_login_time = #{geekposQueueLastLoginTime},is_new_qrcode = #{isNewQrcode}, is_user_identity = #{isUserIdentity},consume_number = #{consumeNumber},rolling_switch = #{rollingSwitch},sweep_mode = #{sweepMode}, open_union_pay = #{openUnionPay},open_money_pay = #{openMoneyPay},pos_plus_type = #{posPlusType} ,third_appid=#{thirdAppid}, dazhong_shop_id = #{dazhongShopId},dazhong_app_auth_token = #{dazhongAppAuthToken},integral_pay = #{integralPay},pos_open_table = #{posOpenTable}, open_pos_ali_pay=#{openPosAliPay},open_pos_union_pay = #{openPosUnionPay},open_pos_money_pay = #{openPosMoneyPay},open_pos_shanhui_pay = #{openPosShanhuiPay}, open_pos_integral_pay = #{openPosIntegralPay},open_pos_charge = #{openPosCharge},tv_mode = #{tvMode},modify_order_print_receipt = #{modifyOrderPrintReceipt},modify_order_print_kitchen = #{modifyOrderPrintKitchen}, open_pos_pay_order = #{openPosPayOrder},open_order_remark = #{openOrderRemark},open_pos_wechat_pay = #{openPosWeChatPay},template_type = #{templateType},wait_ip = #{waitIp},is_recommend_category = #{isRecommendCategory}, tv_text_color = #{tvTextColor},tv_background = #{tvBackground},tv_textbox_background = #{tvTextBoxBackground},wait_remind_text = #{waitRemindText},is_turntable = #{isTurntable},turntable_print_type = #{turntablePrintType},is_takeout = #{isTakeout}, open_pos_discount = #{openPosDiscount},apart = #{apart} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select s.id,s.ali_seller_id ,s.ali_appId,s.ali_public_key,s.ali_private_key,s.name,s.address,s.phone,s.open_time,s.close_time,s.status,s.remark,s.shop_mode,s.add_user,s.longitude,s.latitude,s.add_time,s.update_time,s.brand_id,s.update_user,s.is_open,s.tv_mode, s.is_pos_new,s.page_size,s.is_open_sms,s.notice_telephone,open_meituan,b.mq_id, b.brand_name,s.city,s.photo,sm.name as shopmode_name,s.shop_detail_index,restaurant_id,appid, appsecret, mchid, mchkey,pay_cert_path,wx_server_id,is_sub,s.is_takeout,s.open_pos_discount, s.shop_tag from shop_detail s left join brand b on s.brand_id=b.id left join shop_mode sm on s.shop_mode=sm.id where s.state=1 order by b.brand_name asc,s.shop_detail_index asc
select id,name from shop_detail where brand_id = #{brandId} and state = 1

select s.*,b.brand_name,s.consume_confine_time,s.consume_confine_unit from shop_detail s LEFT JOIN brand b on s.brand_id = b.id where brand_id=#{0} and s.state=1 and s.is_open=1 ORDER BY s.shop_detail_index
select city from shop_detail where is_open=1 and state = 1 and brand_id = #{brandId} group by city
select * from shop_detail where state = 1 and is_open=1 and (city like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{name}), '%') or name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{name}), '%')) and brand_id = #{brandId}
select * from shop_detail where state = 1 and is_open=1 and city = #{city} and brand_id = #{brandId}
select * from shop_detail where state = 1 and is_open=1 and brand_id = #{brandId} order by shop_detail_index

SELECT s.id,s.name,IFNULL(s.slogan,bs.slogan) slogan,IFNULL(s.queue_notice,bs.queue_notice) queue_notice from shop_detail s LEFT JOIN brand b on s.brand_id = b.id LEFT JOIN brand_setting bs on b.brand_setting_id = bs.id where s.id = #{shopId}
mapper.update: update shop_detail set pos_waitred_envelope = #{state} where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM shop_detail s WHERE s.id IN
#{shopDetailId}
